---
id: refresh-data-link-cache
title: "Refresh data-link cache"
description: "Refreshes the data-link cache for the given `workspaceId` or `credentialsId`. Forces immediate re-discovery of available cloud storage resources."

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Refresh data-link cache"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/data-links/cache/refresh"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Refreshes the data-link cache for the given `workspaceId` or `credentialsId`. Forces immediate re-discovery of available cloud storage resources.
